title: Glue records
description: Configure GLUE records for your name servers.
emptyHint: Add a GLUE record to use custom name servers with your domain.

add.title: Add GLUE record
add.description: Create a GLUE record for a custom name server.
add.info: GLUE records allow you to use name servers under your own domain.
add.ipsHelp: IPv4 and/or IPv6 addresses, separated by commas

edit.title: Edit GLUE record
edit.description: Modify the GLUE record IP addresses.
edit.ipsHelp: IPv4 and/or IPv6 addresses, separated by commas

delete.title: Delete GLUE record
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this GLUE record?

info.title: What are GLUE records?
info.description: GLUE records are required when your name server is a subdomain of the domain it serves. They provide the IP address of the name server to avoid circular DNS lookups.
